```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(data.table)
library(plyr)
library(scales)
library(wordcloud)
library(syuzhet)
library(tidyverse)
library(RCurl)
library(tidyr)
library(tm)
library(SnowballC)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(e1071)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidytext)
library(purrr)
```


```{r}
shiny_data <- read.csv("~/recruitment_task/shiny_data.csv", row.names=1)
head(shiny_data)
```

```{r}
shiny_data %>% select(urlDrugName, rating, y_pred, condition) -> shiny_data_final
shiny_data_final$rating <- as.double(shiny_data_final$rating)
head(shiny_data_final) 
```


```{r} 
shiny_data_final %>% group_by(urlDrugName) %>% summarize(avg_rating = mean(rating), avg_sent_rating = mean(y_pred), n_reviewes= n()) 
```
```{r}
shiny_data_final %>% group_by(urlDrugName, condition) %>% summarize(Average_Rating = mean(rating), Average_Sentiment_Rating = mean(y_pred), n_reviews= n()) -> ranking_final
head(ranking_final)
```

```{r}
ranking_final %>% filter(urlDrugName == "abilify") #%>% summarize(avg_rating = mean(rating), avg_sent_rating = mean(y_pred)) 

```
```{r}
ranking_final %>% filter(condition ==  "depression") %>% arrange(desc(Average_Rating),desc(Average_Sentiment_Rating))  %>% head(5) -> plotdrugs # summarize(avg_rating = mean(rating), avg_sent_rating = mean(y_pred)) 
plotdrugs

```

```{r}
plotdrugs %>%
               ggplot(aes(reorder(urlDrugName,Average_Rating), Average_Rating, fill = Average_Sentiment_Rating)) +
               geom_col(show.legend = TRUE) +
               xlab("Drug name") +
               ylab("Average overall ranking") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1))

            #   facet_wrap(~ topic, scales = "free", shrink = TRUE) +
```

```{r}
plotdrugs %>% head(1) -> best_drug
best_drug
```
